body:
Comment 5: 
I think this is working as intended, because git is super subtle and
we already do X, whatever X is.  Switching to do Y instead would
change behavior in subtle ways that I don't want to have to explain.

Note that when 'go get' must make a choice between 'easy for users'
and 'easy for code author', it chooses the former, on the assumption
(hope) that you have more users than developers.
